channel.title: Some Things I Need Help With [DELTA]
channel.description:
1. How can I make it so a play is muted on login, and they would have to type a command to unmute themselves?
2. The godsword stances in my server are very boring, how can I make them like [img]http://www.2speced.info/forums/image.php?u=27857&dateline=1251063286[/img]
3. i've tried to add Ken's non renamed client interface, but on my server, the interface is transparent.
Will update this when I find more problems.
